useAuthMustBeUsedWithinAuthProvider: useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider
parentIdRequired: Parent ID is required or entity data will be an orphaned record

404.message: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future

401.message: Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided

403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource

500.message: An error occurred on the server and the request could not be completed

503.message: The server is not ready to handle the request

505.message: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request
